Log.Item2: Bartender! Hope I won't see anyone drunk here! The prohibition laws have just passed, and thankfully, might I add!
You know, alcohol is a poison, and I'm glad that the government has finally realized that.
Before you ask, I'm Howard, but you can call me law. I'm the law. And I will have my revenge on the alcohol industry.
You will remember my name, bartender.
I'm Howard.
Yeah.
The law of this city.
Good evening and good to see you, bartender. Just heard the news about the prohibition laws. I'm glad you're still open, I was worried for you.
May I ask you for a Ripple, even if it's a bit risky?
Serves a Ripple
A perfect Ripple, indeed. I'm impressed that you have the courage to stay open. Take care of yourself.
May I ask you for another one for my husband, Eugene? He's waiting for me at the table.
HEEEEELLO BARTENDER! Oh honey, why the long face?
WHAAAAT? Prohibition laws? Oh, I see. Well, I'm glad you're still open.
So can I really get a Ripple here? If it's not too much trouble, of course. In that case… I can just… pass.
Serves a Ripple
THIS IS A RIPPLE! Oh, I mean, this is a Ripple.
See you soon for another cup of water, you know what I mean? *wink wink*
Hi… I was walking by and noticed this bar was still open despite everything. You're doing the good thing, nobody is actually in favor of prohibition.
Though, I expected to find my good friend Ernest behind the counter, hah! Maybe he retired…?
Anyway… I'm a bit nervous tonight, so I need that bit of booze… Can you make me a Palmera?
Serves a Palmera
Perfect! <size=75%>Okay Luke… You can do it… Just walk up to her and, uh… <size=100%> Oh! Uh, I gotta go! Here's a tip for you, thanks again and bye!
Bonsoir, barman. This establishment was recommended to me by a trusted client.
You may want to consider investing in alcohol stocks by the way… Prices have been increasing lately with the prohibition law. It's still not illegal to consume it, however.
Now, I would like to try out a Magazine, s'il vous plaît.
Serves a Magazine
A discrete Ferrucci in this Magazine. I see we have similar tastes in wine.

Here, a small souvenir from my business. It will get me some publicity if you hang it in your bar.
Anyway, bonne nuit, barman.
Bartendeeerrrr, I know what your doing, hands up!
Oh... this seems like a normal bar tho... no alcohol to be seen. Damn those kids, they have pranked me again, they will learn to respect me, the law.
Ya know, they always use this popular way of saying nowadays it was similar to I have to see a man...
mmmmmh...
Weird that you know it bartender, this is not that common at all...
Aren’t you serving alcohol here dont’ you?
You better not... I'm keeping an eye on you
Well hello hello there! Hope you've read the latest edition of Rogue, it's got some hefty tips on how to dress stylishly!
In any case, I shouldn't squander too much time before my next competition. Honey, make me a Ripple!
But with Verlan instead of Caledon, I like the bitterness of it. Oh, and no Gryte… Just add some more Verlan to it.
Serves a Spring Bee

Oh my, oh my! Just how I love it. If I didn't know any better I'd think you were trying to make an impression on me!
Well, I'll definitely be coming back then! See you!
Good to see you again there. It seems like this place is picking up the pace with the customers, even though you're new in the neighborhood.
One Parti for me, please. And shaken, not stirred, if it's not too much to ask.
Serves a Parti

A fantastic drink, no doubt. It's nice to come here after work and find this welcoming atmosphere.
Oh, I'm overstaying my welcome. Have a good night.

Well, hello again. I didn't notice it before but that plant over there is very pretty. It would fit well in my house.
…or is it part of the wallpaper? I can't tell.
An Everest for me now! I don't have all day.
Serves a Everest

The quality has improved from the last time I was here! But I'll have you know you still have a long way to go.
Bye bye!
Good morning bartender, how are you doing here in this nasty place of a bar?
Oh, I was already here today, that's suspicious... but I didn't find anything here before.
Ugh, those kids again, they don't understand how bad it is to talk about alcohol like that, in this free way, they don't know what it did to my mother... *crickets*
Ehm ehm... anyway, what do you think about it?
That's a very strange thing to say, don't you realise you're standing in front of a police inspector?
And you say that to me after what I've told you about my mother!
Next time you make a stance like that, I'll put you in jail, so keep an eye out, bartender.
Oh, wonderful to see you again, dear bartender! My day was so busy that I almost forgot to come here.
But it improved when I found out Eliza Davids will attend the ball tonight, right here in Korgis. If only I could attend too…
May I get a Palmera, please? I've heard bars are still selling alcohol despite the law…
Serves a Palmera

Perfect cocktail, dear bartender. I'd like to order another one, but I don't wish to overstay my welcome here… Maybe I'll visit another bar…
Goodnight!
